alert.note: Alert for Chisos Basin; Crane; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reagan; Terrell; Upton; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 03 at 7:20AM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT /10 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ TUESDAY FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 8% OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO AND MOST OF WEST TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 9% OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR THE PRESIDIO VALLEY, LOWER BREWSTER COUNTY, AND CRANE, PECOS, REAGAN, TERRELL, UPTON, AND WARD COUNTIES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY OF 9% OR LESS, 20 FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR MORE, AND HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR THE PRESIDIO VALLEY, LOWER BREWSTER COUNTY, AND CRANE, PECOS, REAGAN, TERRELL, UPTON, AND WARD COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Ward, Crane, Upton, Reagan, Pecos, Terrell, Chisos Basin, Presidio Valley and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 3 percent. * RFTI...8 or extreme. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are expected to persist for an extended period with little to no improvement overnight. Avoid the use of open flames or any activities that may generate sparks. Accidental ignitions will have the potential to grow quickly into dangerous wind-driven wildfires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures will increase potential for fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Chisos Basin; Crane; Lower Brewster County; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Reagan; Terrell; Upton; Ward
